titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the 1660 list of Dutch immigrants to New Netherland 1977.361
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-11-22 20:23:03 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: 1660 list of Dutch immigrants to New Netherland
did.abstract: One photostat copy of a manuscript listing emigrants from Holland to the Dutch colonial province of New Netherland (later New York) in 1660.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: At the time it was copied (circa 1952), the original manuscript was held in the New York State Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); 1660 list of Dutch immigrants to New Netherland, 1977.361, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid reviseed by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One photostat copy of a manuscript listing emigrants from Holland to the Dutch colonial province of New Netherland (later New York) in 1660. The manuscript is written in Dutch.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
